TheRed

Front-End Web Developer

Practice makes perfect, I made this website because of firstly practice, and secondly for fun. I like to think of many ideas and really try to implement them.

For the sake of observing the reaction of what people think about the website, it is currently in the demo stage, and maybe I'll go on developing the whole thing, it depends. ;)

Maybe somehow you have some spare shells, you can consider donating some of them.

Website is our place
and we're a network

This website enhances your school experience, we offer several additional features and content that the official website lacks.

Chinese Translation

The biggest, unofficial
TSWGSS website.

Actually, the original purpose of designing the whole thing or developing the whole thing is to improve my marketing, web design, and web development skills. But hey, an unofficial website for a school is cool, right?

Solo Creation

The terms "we" and "our" will appear in many places on our services. However, it is just a way to make everything look better. It's completely solo.

More Information

This website provides you with more content or information related to this school. No matter ranging from news to some study-related stuff.

Helpful Widgets

With the helpful widgets on this website, it's more efficient to do some specific things. Additionally, more tools will be developed from time to time.

Discover the freshest news
about the school.

Freedom of speech is completely under the protection of this website with full control of us. We provide a platform for students to transfer what they know to us; we'll take the role of a middleman to transfer the news to everyone.

Learn More

Learn something more
about this platform.

We...well, I, made this website. At first, I just thought buying the [School Name].com was a really interesting idea, and having an experimental spirit is essential for me. So I purchased the domain with 9 bucks. Then, I developed everything and everything evolved many times. You might want to hear more about us.

Learn More

Learning is dawning,
sharing is caring.

Teaching and learning should not have any boundaries or limitations. In the internet generation, we must have the sense to self-learn everything. We provide a platform for TSWGSS school students to teach and learn, bascially exchanging knowledge in the way they want.

Learn More

Small widgets make your tasks easier. We don't call them tools anymore.

We develop tools... actually, widgets for you to use. Yeah, we call them tools before the redesign of this website. What's better than having useful tools to enhance your school experience? Ranging from DSE Past Paper Searcher to some secret future possible widgets, you can always stay tuned.

Now, let's check what do we have by going to the widgets page! This also gives us maximized room for us to develop even more interesting stuff.

Learn more about the official.

At the end of the day, the unofficial one won't be bigger than the official one. Thus, you can go check out the official site from the official school for more information you may looking for.
